name: declaratively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves knowledge or facts: The men were confident, the women unsettled - some vaguely, some declaratively. Neither positive nor negative experiences are necessarily remembered declaratively.
in a way that involves making an announcement about something, often one that is written and official: This is the moment where we can make that statement declaratively to the world. I'm in a very good position to say declaratively that this would be a huge mistake. Related word
declaration
